name: European Cities Against Drugs
memberOrga: ECAD's members are cities/towns, in 2015, 60 cities were paid-up members with right to vote at the ECAD Plenary session.
goal: ECAD is a non-profit organization incorporated in Sweden, the purpose of which is to provide and develop through democratic means the fight against drugs. The purpose of ECAD is to provide experience and knowledge about the work against drugs and drug abuse at local, national and international levels. ECAD will work for democracy and development in towns and cities in Europe. The spread of drugs and drug abuse constitute a threat to democracy and development. The long-term aims of ECAD are to contribute to a Europ√© free from drugs.
interests: Education and training, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: ECAD follows EU legislation and strategies on anti-drug policy coordination
